resources.string:
-Mmarau Mobile Info is a Mobile Application for the Android platform that seeks to provide realtime Informatio n About major Notices, Events and news in and around the Campus.

-The Data is aggregated from different sources from within the Campus, Currently the Information source for the application will be data from Varios Admins with access to the Backend and can manually add information about notices, events and news.

-The App will also Enable realtime reply to Inquiries through the Create inquiry module in the App that Enables individuals to Inquire.

-The inquiries will be taken to concerned parties and replied in the dashboard backend so that the feedback will be shown directly to the App.
-Please rate our app on play store we could also please use your good review so drop it on our playstore page.
The following Open source Libraries have been used in developing the Data and Presentation Logic of the Application, without them it would be a pretty complex task.
Are you sure you want to logout!!
